name: Starstream Gauntlets
data: It increases the users strength pitifully.
It increases the users dexterity a good amount.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'throw'.
The rails on the gauntlets allow shurikens to be launched with greater
